pr_title: WIP: MDEV-18827: Create utility to parse frm files and print their DDL
pr_body:
<!--
If you've already identified a https://jira.mariadb.org/ issue
that seems to track this bug/feature, please add its number below.
-->
- [x] *The Jira issue number for this PR is: MDEV-18827*
## Description
The utility program parses a .frm file and generates the "CREATE TABLE" statement for the table.

## How can this PR be tested?
mariafrm.test
<!--
Tick one of the following boxes [x] to help us understand
if the base branch for the PR is correct
-->
## Basing the PR against the correct MariaDB version
- [x] *This is a new feature and the PR is based against the latest MariaDB development branch*
- [ ] *This is a bug fix and the PR is based against the earliest branch in which the bug can be reproduced*
